message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $150. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with a price of $140 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about $150, and we have a deal?
